item.title: digital garden
item.description: digital garden ❀ ✿ # single plot serves as my digital garden. While it may sound like a flowery attempt to rebrand blogging, the concept is straightforward: a digital garden is a space where ideas are sown, nurtured, and refined over time. This particular plot is mine, and I prefer to let it grow a bit wild. origin # Digital gardens have been quietly cultivated by people in the corners of the internet for some time.

item.title: itinerary
item.description: itinerary # These plans are subject to change, however I will be starting out in Indonesia. country list # Indonesia Singapore China South Korea Japan Philippines Vietnam Cambodia Laos Thailand Malaysia India Nepal Kyrgyzstan Kazakhstan Uzbekistan Tajikistan Azerbaijan Georgia Armenia Turkey Jordan open to visiting # Egypt Cote d’Ivoire Bangladesh Morocco Zambia Algeria Botswana Oman Namibia Senegal Tanzania Zimbabwe Tunisia Greece

item.title: one bag
item.description: one bag philosophy # Onebagging is about travelling with only a single carry-on sized bag. It is about better experiencing the place you’re visiting whilst avoiding being weighed down by any excess. This means only bringing the essentials you need to move about comfortably and efficiently. While this may vary from person to person, the typical backpacker who carries their belongings like a snail with its shell doesn’t quite align with this approach.

item.title: resources
item.description: resources # A select few resources that I’ve found interesting or useful, and you might too. art & design # ArtAsiaPacific: periodical covering contemporary art and culture from Asia, the Pacific and the Middle East. Fontshare: high-quality foundry of free fonts for both personal and commercial use. Frieze: platform covering modern and contemporary art. The League of Moveable Type: the world’s first open-source font foundry. articles # What can a technologist do about climate change?
